Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 14 Parittārammaṇattika » 14.1 Paṭiccavāra » 14.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 14.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Nakamma
Parittārammaṇattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nakamma
7.
2172Parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  parittārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca parittārammaṇā cetanā. (1)
2173Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  mahaggatārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇā cetanā. (1)
2174Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  appamāṇārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇā cetanā. (1)
<< Napurejātādiup Navipākādi >>
